scripts.deploy:vault-dev: export layer_arn=$(aws-vault exec sls-template-dev -- aws lambda list-layer-versions --layer-name Tododev | jq -r '.LayerVersions[0].LayerVersionArn') && aws-vault exec sls-template-dev -- sls deploy --stage=dev
scripts.deploy:vault-staging: export layer_arn=$(aws-vault exec sls-template-dev -- aws lambda list-layer-versions --layer-name Todostaging | jq -r '.LayerVersions[0].LayerVersionArn') && aws-vault exec sls-template-dev -- sls deploy --stage=staging
scripts.deploy:vault-prod: export layer_arn=$(aws-vault exec sls-template-prod -- aws lambda list-layer-versions --layer-name Todoprod | jq -r '.LayerVersions[0].LayerVersionArn') && aws-vault exec sls-template-prod -- sls deploy --stage=prod
scripts.deploy:dev: export layer_arn=$(aws lambda list-layer-versions --layer-name Tododev | jq -r '.LayerVersions[0].LayerVersionArn') && sls deploy --stage=dev
scripts.deploy:staging: export layer_arn=$(aws lambda list-layer-versions --layer-name Todostaging | jq -r '.LayerVersions[0].LayerVersionArn') && sls deploy --stage=staging
scripts.deploy:prod: export layer_arn=$(aws lambda list-layer-versions --layer-name Todoprod | jq -r '.LayerVersions[0].LayerVersionArn') && sls deploy --stage=prod
